episode35.name: 36   Wofford, Sleepy Hollow University , and season recap
episode35.description: We talk Arkansas' victory over Wofford, their defeat in a high pace exciting matchup with North Carolina, and give a season recap.
episode35.keywords: Arkansas Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, WPS,  Wofford, North Carolina, Tar Heels, Basketball, UNC, Sleepy Hollow
